Histite is a light metal that is used by reapers to make 
tools or construct buildings.
Пирит - крепкий метал, который используе:
Pyrite is a strong metal that is used by reapers to create armor,
weapons, or stronger alloys.
Гидрит - целительный минерал, который ис:
Hydrite is a healing mineral that is used
tsami in medicine, mainly to create life ingots.
Милит - минерал, излучающий мощные магич:
Milite is a mineral that emits powerful magical waves.
Used as an energy catalyst for buildings.
Тиранит - самый прочный металл. Использу:
Tyranite is the strongest metal. It is used to create
research of armor/weapons for the Werolomgers.
